title: Mobile Business Communication English Intensive Course for Working Professionals

context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, enhancing workplace communication for science professionals.

learning_goals: In scientific work contexts, English emails consisting of five or more sentences can be composed
During video conferences, communication utilizing three or more professional terms (e.g., data analysis, hypothesis) is possible
Opinions can be clearly expressed in 10-minute English project discussions with colleagues

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
